Home

About Us
>
Charlotte Harbor Event & Conference Center
Charlotte Harbor Event & Conference Center
About Us
As our name implies, our facility was built for two main purposes, first to be an event center for the local community and second, to be a conference center for both local and regional groups and organizations. Upon its opening in January of 2009 the Charlotte Harbor Event and Conference Center has hosted small meetings, large galas, sporting events, concerts, expos and just about anything else you can think of. For a facility that is just over 44,000 square feet, it stays very busy.
We have a small dedicated staff that feels that every event, no matter how small or large, deserves the same amount of support and attention. We are an ideal location for those events that don’t want to get lost in a large expansive facility as well as those smaller local events, that at one time had to go to a larger city, we can now cater to you in your own backyard.
We believe in partnering with you, our customer, to make your event the most memorable that it can be. We listen to your comments and needs, and strive to make your event as worry-free as possible and to exceed your expectations.
A small example of what the Charlotte Harbor Event and Conference Center has to offer:
240 FREE parking spaces on site
7 flexible meeting spaces
1000 person dining capacity;
1800 general session capacity
Close proximity to I-75 and US-41 (Tamiami Trail)
High speed internet access and Free Wi-Fi throughout the facility
11 theatrical line-sets in main meeting space along with diverse in-house audio-visual services
Exclusive food & beverage services provided by Savor…Charlotte Harbor
2 Loading docks and ramp provide easy-load-in and load-out
ADA accessibility
of
Transcript
Nestled in the heart of Southwest Florida on the shore of the Peace River, the Charlotte Harbor Event & Conference Center offers 44,000 square feet of event space, pristine water front views and top food service management for events of all sizes and budgets, along with a heart-felt welcome from our community. If you can imagine it, we can make it happen:
Consumer expos and trade shows
Sports tournaments
Regional conventions
National conventions
Weddings
Formal gatherings, and everything in between
Whether you’re looking for a facility to hold your next event or something to do this weekend, consider visiting the Charlotte Harbor Event & Conference Center located in the heart of Punta Gorda; a city rich with culture, history, passion, and small town hospitality.
The Charlotte Harbor Event and Conference Center offers panoramic waterfront views of the Peace River and Charlotte Harbor. A state-of-the-art facility that opened in January 2009, the Charlotte Harbor Event and Conference Center consists of beautiful decor, professional and flexible multi-purpose spaces, top food service management, waterfront vistas, and warm hospitality. The Charlotte Harbor Event & Conference Center is managed by ASM Global.
ASM Global was formed by the merger of AEG Facilities and SMG, global leaders in venue and event strategy, management and other services. For more than 40 years, our clients have benefited from our depth of resources and unparalleled experience, expertise and creative problem-solving. Our success is built on our many local and national relationships and partnerships with publicly- and privately-owned venues, event producers, suppliers, architects, developers, sports teams and industry associations.
Together, we will create even greater experiences. Our vision is to connect the world through inspiration, innovation and imagination in order to realize the potential of the spaces and places that bring people together, so together we can elevate the human spirit and move the world forward.
.
of

Home
>
Plan Your Event
>
Event Planning Guide
Event Planning Guide
of
Transcript
The Charlotte Harbor Event and Conference Center offers state-of-the-art facilities consisting of beautiful decor, professional and flexible multi-purpose spaces, top food service management. Charlotte Harbor offers world-class boating, fishing, sailing, abundant nature explorations, pristine beaches, challenging golf, unique shopping and dining experiences, and a thriving arts community. It is considered to be Southwest Florida’s premier year-round eco-tourism destination.The Charlotte Harbor Event and Conference Center offers the following features:
Concourse
The concourse can be utilized as pre-function/registration space and has a ceiling height of 23′. The flooring is terrazzo inlaid with a decorative marine design. Power and data connections are available on both sides of the concourse. A cafe is located in the concourse.
Main Hall – Hibiscus A, B, & C
This hall can be divided into three separate smaller halls. The flooring is portable carpet tiles over concrete slab. The ceiling height ranges from 46′ over stage (in Hibiscus A) to 38′ throughout the remainder of the hall. Hibiscus Hall provides electrical connections on a 30′ x 30′ grid in the floor.
Meeting Rooms
Myakka River Room A & B, Peace River Room A & B. Both the Myakka River Room and the Peace River Room can be divided into two separate smaller rooms to create four break-out rooms. The ceiling height throughout these rooms is 12′. The flooring is carpet.
Theater Staging Areas
Group Dressing Rooms: There are two group dressing rooms, and each includes full bathrooms with sink, shower, toilet and lighted make-up mirrors.
Star Dressing Rooms:
There are two star dressing rooms, and each includes private full bathrooms with sink, shower, toilet and lighted make-up mirrors.
Great Lawn
The Great Lawn is comprised of 18,000 square feet along the waterfront. A terrace made of pavers is adjacent to the building, and two entrances open out to the Great Lawn from the concourse. The standing-room capacity of the lawn is approximately 2,000, including the terrace. The Great Lawn includes power connections at both the side stage location and waterside, allowing for flexible use.
of
